meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Scott Humphrey Lisa Korn Alex Boisvert Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4028.

td.p: Scott Humphrey, an attorney from Austin, Texas
Lisa Korn, an elementary school teacher from Los Angeles, California
Alex Boisvert, a graduate student from Los Angeles, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $34,400)

tr.td: SOUTH AMERICAN SAFARI
THEY HAVE A UNION
PANCREAS, SPLEEN OR APPENDIX
"Y" ME
PEACHES & HERB
REUNITED
